channel.title: Baseball Geeks: MLB news with a Fantasy Baseball spin
channel.description: Rob Reed presents a Major League Baseball (with a Fantasy spin) podcast from links and information submitted to the BaseballGeeks.com and PlayerTrack.com sites.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2008, Baseballgeeks.com, Rob Reed. All Rights Reserved.

image.title: Baseball Geeks: MLB news with a Fantasy Baseball spin

channel.itunes:author: BaseballGeeks.com
channel.itunes:summary: Rob Reed presents Baseball and Fantasy discussions related to links and posts submitted to the BaseballGeeks.com and PlayerTrack.com sites.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Baseball and Fantasy Baseball discussions

item.title: BaseballGeeks 4.21: High on Big Papi
item.description: Rob and Gregg discuss the latest news in baseball... Rob goes on the record to say Big Papi will hit at least 25 HRs, and he promptly comes out and hits a few in response

item.title: BaseballGeeks 4.7: Blue Jay Way
item.description: Rob and Gregg discuss the latest in baseball news with their fantasy-baseball-colored glasses. Topics include the Blue Jays, Vernon Wells, Joel Zumaya, and the Dodgers. Listen for info on our Beat the Geeks leagues!

item.title: BaseballGeeks 4.2: Inaugurations and Arbitrations
item.description: Gregg and I look at the latest news in baseball, with a fantasy filter. Topics include the latest signings, the World Baseball Classic, and some free agent chat.

item.title: BaseballGeeks 4.1: The Geeks are back!
item.description: We are back at blogtalkradio.com/baseballgeeks with a live show every Tuesday at 4:00pm PST. In our first show together in a year and a half, Gregg and I talk some of the recent free agent acquisitions, including Derek Lowe, John Smoltz, and Milton Bradley.
item.itunes:author: BaseballGeeks.com
item.itunes:summary: We are back at blogtalkradio.com/baseballgeeks with a live show every Tuesday at 4:00pm PST. In our first show together in a year and a half, Gregg and I talk some of the recent free agent acquisitions, including Derek Lowe, John Smoltz, and Milton Bradley.

item.title: BaseballGeeks 3.14: BABIP is your friend!
item.description: Rob is back witha new podcast and a new PlayerTrack.com update, where he looks at BABIP among hitters and pitchers in order to spot hidden gems and hidden goats

item.title: BaseballGeeks 3.12: Wed Night Fantasy Roundup
item.description: Rob presents his semi-regular "Wednesday Night Practical" where you can see the goings on his his various fantasy leagues and get some latest baseball news. PlayerTrack.com has gotten its first offensive update of the year.

item.title: BaseballGeeks PodCast #4, Vol #2
item.description: Rob and Gregg talk about their money league draft results and they give out their predictions for the division winners for 2007. Last chance to get in on the "Beat the Geeks" 12 team fantasy league. Email us at podcast@baseballgeeks.com ASAP. Draft is Sunday, 4/1 at 4pm!

item.title: Meet the Geeks
item.description: A brief video introducing Gregg and Rob and their methods of preparation before a podcast... we'll be back with another podcast soon. Our money league draft is tomorrow, March 25th. Wish us luck! Fantasy questions can be sent to podcast@baseballgeeks.com. You just might be included in the show...
